label: Antibody
description: the COVID ID for the antibody

label: Antibody label
description: the COVIC label for the antibody

label: Antibody name
description: the submitter's name for the antibody

label: Antibody details
comment: confidential, unstructured assay details on antibody from the sumbitter

label: Antibody comment
comment: confidential free text about the antibody

label: Organization name
description: the name of the organization that submitted the antibody
comment: the organization that is submitted the antibody

label: Submitter email
description: the email of the person who submitted this data

label: Host
description: the ID of the host species

label: Host name
description: the label of the host species

label: Isotype
description: the ID of the antibody isotype

label: Isotype label
description: the label of the antibody isotype

label: Qualitiative measure
description: the qualitative measure of the assay

label: Titer
description: the titer value of the assay

label: Tested antigen
description: the name of the tested antigen

label: n
description: the number of runs for the assay
